title: Prospect for a city
creator_credit: Henry Cooper, Alan Harper and Harper Films
brief_description: Edinburgh is an outstanding example of a planned city and this film was made to mark the bi-centenary of the plans of the first architect, James Craig. Today modern ideas of town planning are being incorporated in the old city of squares and vistas.
